lead_paragraph: Jeremy Crouch had 27 points, including a 3-pointer that sparked a decisive run, to lead Bradley (20-15) to a 96-85 victory against Virginia (17-16) in the semifinals of the College Basketball Invitational in Charlottesville, Va. Bradley will face Tulsa (23-13), a 73-69 winner against visiting Houston (24-10), on Monday in the first game of a best-of-three championship.
